Name: Jupiter
Namesake: King of the Roman gods, aka Zeus.

Name: Mars
Namesake: Roman god of war, aka Ares.

Name: Venus
Namesake: Roman goddess of love, aka Aphrodite.

Name: Earth
Namesake: A variation on the word "ground" in several languages.

Name: Neptune
Namesake: Roman god of the sea aka, Poseidon.

Name: Saturn
Namesake: Jupiter's father and titan aka, Chronos.

Name: Uranus
Namesake: Greek personificatino of the sky or heavens, aka Caelus.

Name: Mercury
Namesake: Roman god of travellers, aka Hermes.
